title: Ads Executive / Performance Marketing Executive
job_overview:
Ads Executive / Performance Marketing Executive
We are looking for an ad performance expert to help us reach and convert new customers through strategic ad placements and data-backed decisions.

Requirements:

1+ years in digital advertising

Proficient in performance tracking tools

Deep understanding of lookalike audiences and retargeting

Please send your CV to: Upgrade to see actual info
We do not respond to messages via onlinejobs.
